name: Golden Sunlight Truffle Popcorn
description: Indulge in the luxurious taste of Golden Sunlight Truffle Popcorn, a gourmet snack crafted with hand-popped corn kernels, tossed in extra-virgin olive oil and dusted with real black truffle flakes. Each bite delivers an irresistible, earthy aroma and a satisfying crunch, perfect for elevating movie nights or impressing guests. Free from artificial additives and preservatives, this popcorn offers a sophisticated flavor experience for discerning snackers. Enjoy it straight from the bag or pair with your favorite sparkling beverage for a truly decadent treat.

attributes.ingredients: Non-GMO corn, extra-virgin olive oil, black truffle flakes, sea salt
attributes.allergens: May contain traces of milk and soy
